mapper.insert: insert into tbl_bbs(bid, title, content, writer, regdate, category, target, duedate, splace, status) values(#{bid}, #{title},#{content},#{writer},now(),#{category}, #{target}, #{duedate}, #{splace}, #{status})
mapper.select: select rowid from tbl_sequence where tid='F001'
mapper.update: update tbl_sequence set rowid = #{rowid} where tid='F001'
mapper.select: select bid, title, writer, duedate from tbl_bbs where regdate>0 order by bid desc
